mapper.insert:
insert into "backend_request_info" (project_id, request_ip, request_url, request_method, request_controller, request_api, request_time) values
( #{bean.projectId}, #{bean.requestIp}, #{bean.requestUrl}, #{bean.requestMethod}, #{bean.requestController}, #{bean.requestApi}, #{bean.requestTime} )

insert into backend_exception_info (project_id, exception, error_time) values
( #{bean.projectId}, #{bean.exception}, #{bean.errorTime} )

insert into front_performance_log (url, type, data,project_id) values
( #{bean.url}, #{bean.type}, #{bean.data}, #{bean.projectId} )

insert into front_exception_log (url, type, data,project_id) values
( #{bean.url}, #{bean.type}, #{bean.data}, #{bean.projectId} )

insert into mobile_performance_log (view, project_id, fps, memory) values
( #{bean.view}, #{bean.projectId}, #{bean.fps}, #{bean.memory} )

insert into backend_log_info (project_id, log_content, log_time, log_level) values
( #{bean.projectId}, #{bean.logContent}, #{bean.logTime}, #{bean.logLevel} )
